a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Mechanisms in place to enhance policy coherence for sustainable
A composite indicator which covers mechanisms related to: 1) Institutionalisation of political commitment 2) Long-term
considerations in decision-making 3) Inter-ministerial and cross-sectoral coordination 4) Participatory processes 5) Policy
linkages 6) Alignment across government levels 7) Monitoring and reporting for policy coherence 8) Financing for policy
coherence. Score expressed as a percentage of the maximum.
Data source: United Nations Environment Programme
